meanings.sent1: She remained uncomplaining even when faced with a difficult situation.
meanings.sent2: The uncomplaining attitude of the students impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent3: The uncomplaining cat patiently waited for its dinner, not uttering a single meow.
meanings.sent4: The uncomplaining tree stood tall through every storm, its branches bending but never breaking.
meanings.sent5: Her uncomplaining nature made her a favorite among her friends.

meanings.definition: Showing patience and endurance without complaint.
meanings.sent1: Despite the long wait, he remained uncomplaining.
meanings.sent2: The uncomplaining soldier continued to march despite the blistering heat.
meanings.sent3: The uncomplaining clock ticked on, never once complaining about the passage of time.
meanings.sent4: The uncomplaining mountain stood stoically, enduring the harsh weather without a single complaint.
meanings.sent5: Her uncomplaining perseverance inspired those around her.
